items.title: Mastering 3D Animation with iClone
items.headline: Learn The Powerful Workflow Of  iClone And How to Use iClone to Create Amazing Animations
objectives_summary: The goal of Mastering 3D Animation with iClone is to lead the learner by hand through the simple tools in iClone to the complex ones until the learner become comfortable in creating stunning graphics and realistic-looking animations that stand out.
